definitions.text: the region that is inside of something
the inner or enclosed surface of something
the United States federal department charged with conservation and the development of natural resources; created in 1849
situated within or suitable for inside a building

examples: the British Home Office has broader responsibilities than the United States Department of the Interior

definitions.text: located inward; - Leonard Bernstein; - David Denby; - A.R.Gurney,Jr.
examples: Beethoven's manuscript looks like a bloody record of a tremendous inner battle
she thinks she has no soul, no interior life, but the truth is that she has no access to it

definitions.text: of or coming from the middle of a region or country
